## Introduction 

NSE pre market open data. Pre market is from 09.00 hrs to 09.08 hrs (IST). The function returns a dataframe of pre open market and message with number of advances and declines. 
```{r example}
# For Nifty 50 stocks
library(nser)
nseopen()

# For F&O stocks 
library(nser)
nseopen("fo")
```
